org.apache.hadoop.hbase

Class ClientMetaTableAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ClientMetaTableAccessor

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public final class ClientMetaTableAccessor
extends Object
    The (asynchronous) meta table accessor used at client side. Used to read/write region and assignment information store in hbase:meta.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    CatalogFamilyFormat

    • Nested Class Summary

      Collects all returned.

      A ClientMetaTableAccessor.Visitor that collects content out of passed Result.

      static class  ClientMetaTableAccessor.QueryType 
      static interface  ClientMetaTableAccessor.Visitor
      Implementations 'visit' a catalog table row.

                                                                                                boolean excludeOfflinedSplitParents)
        Used to get table regions' info and server. n * @param tableName table we're looking for, can be null for getting all regions
        Parameters:
        excludeOfflinedSplitParents - don't return split parents
        Returns:
        the list of regioninfos and server. The return value will be wrapped by a CompletableFuture.

        Parameters:

        type - scanned part of meta

      • getRegionLocations

        private static Optional<RegionLocations> getRegionLocations(Result r)
        Returns an HRegionLocationList extracted from the result.
        Returns:
        an HRegionLocationList containing all locations for the region range or null if we can't deserialize the result.
